@theNASEM weighs in. Opening schools is not a YES/NO decision. K-12 are at lower risk of severe #COVID19 but teens can shed as much virus as adults, so K-6 & Middle Sch need different considerations. #COVID19 @moderna_tx vaccine study bravely shows PRNT80 values at the end. (I have no COI). For any future studies, we should demand that full neut curves be shown. Absolute IC50/80 or 90 should be shown. Many ConSera do NOT achieve an PRNT80/90. #DemandFullNeutCurves

#COVID19 vaccine: @iskander summary hits the highlights. But credit when credit is due; in @moderna_tx summary slide, they used PRNT80 (*80* not *50*). This is IMPORTANT! As we will soon show, many convalescent sera will never even achieve an absolute IC80/IC90. (1/n) https://t.co/Mr8L0RnLIR

#COVID19 questions: the first four are of immediate clinical relevance, the last one on the Origins of the Virus is of scientific interest, capable of generating many MPUs (minimal publishable units), but in a sense no longer relevant: #SARSCoV2 is now an endemic human virus. https://t.co/mMe7fYZfOO

I don‚Äôt like titles about ANYTHiNG that can ‚ÄúEnd the #COVID19Pandemic.‚Äù If we had a 100% efficacious vaccine tomorrow; it still would not ‚ÄúEnd the Pandemic‚Äù. We need many modes and options.
